title: Personal Portfolio
description: This current page is my personal portfolio website. It is built using React and Node.js, and hosted on AWS. I plan to update my portfolio as I learn more technologies and build more projects. The source code for this website is available on GitHub, where changes I make are automatically deployed using AWS CodeDeploy.
